name: The Quick And Easy Path
Lore: '''Ready are you? What know you of ready?''',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Sith Fury and your non-epic duels are canceled.  Once per turn, may use 1 Force to take a non-[Episode I] Interrupt (or Immediate Effect) with ''duel'' in its game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  If [Virtual Block 6] Epic Duel on table, Force retrieved (or lost) during a duel cannot be reduced or canceled. (Immune to Alter.)',
